## The Seahawks' Quest for Glory: A Look at Their Super Bowl History
The Seattle Seahawks have been a force to be reckoned with in the National Football League (NFL) for decades, and their Super Bowl wins are a testament to their dedication and perseverance. With a loyal fan base and a talented roster, the Seahawks have made several appearances in the big game, and their victories have been nothing short of historic. In this article, we'll take a closer look at the Seahawks' Super Bowl wins and appearances, and what makes them a team to watch in the NFL.

## Reliving the Seahawks' Super Bowl Wins
The Seahawks have won one Super Bowl in their franchise history, which was Super Bowl XLVIII (48) in 2014. They defeated the Denver Broncos 43-8 in a dominating performance that showcased their defensive prowess. The team was led by quarterback Russell Wilson, who threw for 206 yards and two touchdowns, and running back Marshawn Lynch, who rushed for 39 yards and a touchdown. The Seahawks' defense was nearly impenetrable, holding the Broncos to just 306 total yards and forcing four turnovers.

### Key Stats: Seahawks' Super Bowl Appearances
| Super Bowl | Year | Opponent | Result |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| XLVIII | 2014 | Denver Broncos | W 43-8 |
| XLIX | 2015 | New England Patriots | L 28-24 |
| XL | 2006 | Pittsburgh Steelers | L 21-10 |

## Seahawks' Super Bowl Wins: Coaches and Players React
The Seahawks' Super Bowl wins have been a source of pride for the team and their fans. Coaches and players have reflected on the experiences, with many citing the 2014 win as a highlight of their careers. "It was an incredible feeling, knowing that we had worked so hard to get to that point," said Russell Wilson, the Seahawks' quarterback. "To be able to bring a championship to the city of Seattle was truly special."

## Frequently Asked Questions
Q: How many Super Bowls have the Seahawks won?
A: The Seahawks have won one Super Bowl, which was Super Bowl XLVIII (48) in 2014.
Q: Who was the quarterback for the Seahawks during their Super Bowl win?
A: Russell Wilson was the quarterback for the Seahawks during their Super Bowl win in 2014.
Q: What was the score of the Seahawks' Super Bowl win in 2014?
A: The Seahawks defeated the Denver Broncos 43-8 in Super Bowl XLVIII (48) in 2014.
